name: Sarah Chen
interest: Product Manager focused on writing clear requirements documentation

jobs.description: Leading B2B SaaS product serving 500+ enterprise customers

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: User story: As a data analyst, I want to visualize trends so that I can make data-driven decisions

insights.description: Clear acceptance criteria reduced development rework by 40%
Launched 3 major features that increased user retention by 25%
Functional requirements: System shall support real-time data updates with < 2s latency
Technical requirements: API must handle 1000 requests/second at p95 < 200ms
